definition[0]: a question that is deliberately very confusing and has a humorous or clever answer
example[0]: See if you can solve this riddle.
definition[1]: something that you do not understand and cannot explain
example[1]: The police have been unable to solve the riddle of her disappearance.
definition[2]: a wire container with holes in it that is used to separate earth from stones
definition[3]: to make a lot of small holes in something
example[2]: Two gunmen riddled the bus with gunfire.
definition[4]: to shake the coal or wood in a fire, in order to remove ashes
